overview: Sexy secret agent Jane Bond has been in many a hot spot before… but now she faces her biggest challenge… 350 pounds of pure evil – Thunderthighs! After some erotic espionage encounters, Jane infiltrates S.M.U.T.R.A. – a sinister organization bent on world domination. The sex-action is hot, horny and heavy – but our scintillating spy gets her man, girl, and finally outwits Thunderthighs herself! And what better way to celebrate than to initiate a new stud into the pleasures of the Beautiful Bond!
title: Jane Bond Meets Thunderthighs
